featured.text: Whenever I set foot on the soil of Rwanda, a country in east-central Africa, I feel as if I have entered paradise: green hills, red earth, sparkling rivers and mountain lakes.

As she points out they are not sitting at a table where rich people would sit, her parents calculate the value of the desert hills, the blooming cactus, the calls of eagles, and one another’s company.

definition.zh_def: 小山，通常指比山矮的地形，具有一定的高度和坡度。
definition.en_def: A naturally raised area of land, not as high or steep as a mountain.
definition.example: We climbed to the top of the hill to enjoy the view.
